destructionEnabled.Name: Enable Item Destruction
destructionEnabled.Hint: If disabled, items will not be destroyed at all, and the values will not appear on the item sheets.

destructionManual.Name: Manual Item Destruction
destructionManual.Hint: If enabled, and Item Destruction is also enabled, players will be prompted to delete an item instead of it happening automatically.

destructionSpell.Name: Destroy Spells
destructionSpell.Hint: If enabled, the item destruction feature is enabled for spells.

destructionFeat.Name: Destroy Features
destructionFeat.Hint: If enabled, the item destruction feature is enabled for features.

destructionConsumable.Name: Destroy Consumables
destructionConsumable.Hint: If enabled, the item destruction feature is enabled for consumables.

specialEnabled.Name: Enable Special Recovery
specialEnabled.Hint: If enabled, you can give items the option to recover limited uses when they reach 0 charges.

specialManual.Name: Manual Critical Recovery
specialManual.Hint: If disabled, 'special event' rolls happen automatically.

ItemSheet.destructionTitle: The item will be destroyed when it reaches zero uses and the selected die rolls below the threshold
ItemSheet.specialTitle: The item will regain limited uses using this formula when it reaches zero uses and the selected die rolls above the threshold

Prompt.specialHigher: Roll a {die}; on a {threshold} or higher, the item regains {formula} charges.
Prompt.specialMax: Roll a {die}; on a {threshold}, the item regains {formula} charges.
Prompt.destructionLower: Roll a {die}; on a {threshold} or lower, the item is permanently destroyed.
Prompt.destructionMin: Roll a {die}; on a {threshold}, the item is permanently destroyed.
